**Polyscope** - 3D visualization

Same operations as Blender, but:

- Scriptable and reproducible
- Version controlled
- Research-ready

## Setup Time

**What you need:**

- [Install gpytoolbox & polyscope](https://github.com/odedstein/geometry-processing-research-in-python/tree/main/exercise_00)
- [Download a 3D model](https://github.com/alecjacobson/common-3d-test-models)

**Then we'll load our first mesh together.**

---

## Our First Mesh in Code

```python
import gpytoolbox as gpy
import polyscope as ps

# Load a mesh
v, f = gpy.read_mesh("bunny.obj")

# Visualize it
ps.init()
ps.register_surface_mesh("bunny", v, f)
ps.show()
```

**6 lines. That's all.**
